Source.Name: libu2f-host
Source.Summary: Yubico Universal 2nd Factor (U2F) Host C Library
Source.Description: Libu2f-host provides a C library and command-line tool that implements the host-side of the U2F protocol. There are APIs to talk to a U2F device and perform the U2F Register and U2F Authenticate operations.
